TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed AddInSecurityLevel extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定授予外接程序所加载到的应用程序域的信任级别。

span.span: Specifies the trust level that is granted to the application domain that an add-in is loaded into.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 外接程序系统激活外接程序与对应于指定外接程序的应用程序域的信任级别的权限集。The add-in system activates the add-in with the permission set that corresponds to the trust level specified for the add-in's application domain. 该权限集被定义由公共语言运行时的代码访问安全性 (CAS) 配置。That permission set is defined by the common language runtime's code access security (CAS) configuration. 此枚举的值不能组合使用按位或运算。The values of this enumeration cannot be combined by using the bitwise OR operation. ## Examples 下面的示例激活外接程序具有指定的信任级别。The following example activates an add-in with a specified trust level. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSecurityLevel FullTrust = int32(2)

summary.span: 对可读取和写入本地文件系统、创建网络连接以及从注册表中读取的外接程序使用完全信任安全级别。

span.span: Use the full trust security level for add-ins that are allowed to read and write to the local file system, create network connections, and read from the registry.

summary.span: 通过应用 字段，此安全级别向外接程序代码访问安全性 (CAS) 授予完全访问权限。

span.span: This security level grants full access to the add-in's code access security (CAS) by applying the field.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSecurityLevel Host = int32(3)

summary.span: 使用宿主安全级别为外接程序提供当前授予承载代码的权限。

span.span: Use the host security level to give the add-in the same permissions currently granted to the hosting code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此设置具有两个用途：This setting has two purposes: - 它表示其外接程序宿主可授予的最大的权限集。It represents the maximum permission set a host can grant to its add-ins. - 它允许 ClickOnce 或可扩展应用程序标记语言 (XAML) 浏览器应用程序 (XBAP) 主机传播其源站点的其添加的外接程序，使其能够与服务器联系。It allows a ClickOnce or an Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) Browser Application (XBAP) host to propagate its site of origin to its add-ins, which enables them to contact the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSecurityLevel Internet = int32(0)

summary.span: 对具有低信任级别的外接程序使用 Internet 安全级别。

span.span: Use the Internet security level for add-ins that have a low trust level.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSecurityLevel Intranet = int32(1)

summary.span: 对位于公司 Intranet 上的外接程序使用 Intranet 安全级别。

span.span: Use the Intranet security level for add-ins that are located on a company's intranet.

summary.span: 这些外接程序可以具有较高信任级别，因为服务器和信息都在公司的防火墙内。

span.span: These add-ins can have a greater trust level because the servers and information are within a company's firewall.
